1.title: A Regular Day in Quahog

choices: Peter lets out a horrid fart
11.content:
Meg sees her farther Peter sitting on the couch, who hears Meg crying. "Hey Meg. What's wrong?" "Connie and her friends called me fat
and shoved me into a locker for 3 hours and then the jocks threw mud on me and put this sign on my back." Meg pulls out the sign that
reads 'Ride Meg, the ugly moo cow' . Peter sees this and rolls up the sign. "Oh come on Meg, those kids are dead wrong. You're not
an ugly moo cow." Peter says. Meg beams up, thinking for once her dad is being a good father. "I'm not?" "No. You're an ugly moo cow
who likes to smell farts!" Peter grabs Meg's head and goes to sit on it.

"Dad, what the hell?! Get off m-MMMMPPPHHH!" Meg screams, under Peter. Meg flails around, gasping for fresh air. Meg tries to move
her head away, then BBBRRRRUUUMMMPP! "Hehehehe" Peter does his traditional laugh. Meg groans. "I may not be a smart fella, but
you're a fart smella." FFRRRAMMMPP! "MMMMPPHH!" Meg muffles. Her nose is pressed into Peter's crack and it reeks to high heaven
Meg still struggling, suddenly gets some fresh air. "Oh my God!" Meg then sees Peter without pants. "NOOO!" Meg's fresh air is cut
short by Peter again. Meg's nose connects to Peter's butthole and his smelly rump envelopes Meg's head. A deep rumble is heard...

12.content:
When Meg walked into the door of her house, she sees her mother, Lois, at the kitchen cleaning the dishes as she goes to the table to cry.

"Meg? What happened at school this time?" Lois asked in concern of her daughter.

"It was super awful. Connie and her friends had me locked up in one of the toilet stalls in the girl's bathroom naked and they come back for the other students to take pictures of me with a sign saying "Fat Toilet Slut", even the teachers joined in on it." Meg explained as she keeps on crying.

"Oh. There there, sweetie. Tell you what. Your father's gonna be with his friends out of town for 3 weeks. So, how about you clean yourself up and you can stay in our room with me? Sounds nice?" Lois suggested as she comforted Meg.

"Really? Thanks, Mom." Meg said knowing that at least one person supports her.

Meg goes upstairs to take a clean shower before going to Lois's room and lays down on the bed. She then sees Lois coming back with a basket of laundry in her hands.

"Feeling comfortable, Meg?" Lois asked her daughter.

"Yes. I am, Mom." Meg answered nicely.

As Lois puts tge laundry away, she has her butt pointing at Meg right before she let out a big fart in her face.

"Mom! What the hell?!" Meg yelled as she holds her nose.

"Oops. Sorry, Meg." Lois apologized as she had a smirk on her face before she
12.title: Lois

121.content:
Lois tackled Meg and had her pinned to the bed so she could sit on her face and let off some more farts.

The first fart was slow, loud and foul. It fired up Meg’s nostrils and into her mouth. Meg screamed in agony, flailing her arms and shaking her head around while she was stuck nose deep in her mother’s khaki pants.

The rotten egg smell and burst of vibrations with Lois’ perpetual farting made Meg very uneasy. Lois on the other hand was loving every second. The closest Lois has had to this excitement before was when she would fart into Meg’s cereal with Peter.

Meg was eventually tied to the bed. Lois brought company wanting to let some rip on Meg. Donna Tubbs, Peter’s sister Karen and his estranged daughter Katie.

Karen’s wanting revenge on Meg for putting her in a coma while Katie just missed the opportunity to fart on her sister. Donna’s been wanting to fart all up on Meg’s face ever since she first laid eyes on her.

“Alright Meg, I’m about to step off and give these ladies a turn. Wait- wait!” Lois exclaimed *FRRP-FRRP* “Ah.. that was sharp!”

Lois got up from the smelly and hideous chair that was Meg’s face. Meg could barely see or think straight. The extended face farting from before seriously messed her up.

“Get it off! Get it all off of me!” Meg screamed and cried while shaking her head in tremendous disgust and despair. Meg had a minute to close her eyes. Upon opening them, she was immediately horrified.

“No! No! Get away from me! Please!” Meg screamed in a plea. The next opponent was truly embracing the moment that Meg was doomed as her designated fart smeller. She purposely walked slowly towards Meg with an evil smile and taunted her with a big booty completely filled with gas.
121.title: jumps on Meg's face and farts on her with h...

choices: Lois continues to fart torture Meg
Lois walks (with Meg's face in her ass) to the bathroom to feed Meg her "dinner"
123.content:
Lois apologized to her daughter for farting in her face, but when she did it, she felt a feeling of.... righteousness? She felt like Meg somehow deserved to be farted on and Lois wasn't about to fight that feeling. She felt powerful when she farted in Meg's face. She felt dominant, and she knew that she had to do it again.

When Lois was finally done folding clothes and putting them away, she looked behind herself and noticed that Meg was fast asleep on her back.....face up. Lois felt a smirk run across her face as she slowly crawled on the bed with her legs on either side of Meg's head. Once she was in position, she felt even more daring, as she seemingly unconsciously felt her hands reach up to the waistline of her pants and stick each thumb on either side of her pants. She then slowly pulled her brown pants down, bringing her panties down with them. Lois was now bare assed, about to sit on her own daughter's face and make her eat every single fart that Lois had in her. She then suddenly slammed her ass down onto her daughter's face, with Meg's nose immediately sliding up Lois' butthole and into her rectum. Meg immediately woke up and realized her dire situation. "MOM, WAIT PLEASE DON'T! I'M SORRY FOR YELLING AT YOU PLEASE DON'T DO THIS!" Meg tried to exclaim, but her mouth was covered by Lois's taint. "Good morning, Meg! Sweetheart, I have a surprise for you! You see, the meatloaf that mommy made for dinner last night has been killing my stomach all day, and I have to let some "steam" out...." Lois grinned and pushed hard, releasing a wet, hot, violent sounding 10 second fart that Meg had no choice but to inhale. Meg immediately gagged and already felt vomit threatening to come up. Her mom's darts were somehow even worse than her Dad's! And her dad has the potential to knock someone out with a single fart in the mouth. She learned from...personal experience. Lois laughed maniacally. "Ohh my gawd! That felt so damn good! Now I know exactly what I'm gonna be doing for the next few hours, and that's making you take in every single thing that comes out of my butt!" Lois farted again, a wet, 7 second bubbler which no doubt had to smell like rotten meat. Meg was in hell. Her sinuses were already on fire from those two farts ALONE. There's no way her sense of smell could withstand this torture for hours. She tried to pull her nose out of her mother's ass, but Lois caught her, and she took the belt off of her pants and tied her own daughter's head to her ass, locking Meg's nose deep inside of her mother's deadly behind. Lois ripped fart after fart with no remorse for Meg. About 10 farts in, Meg started crying. She knew that she was going to be in for a very long, painful, and downright putrid evening.

153.content:
Meg, being the whiny little nerd she is, ran right up to her room to cry about something stupid. She flung the door open and, instead of smelling like her own tears and body odor, her room was filled to the brim with an absolutely toxic stink. It reeked like bad chinese pork had given an an entire stable of horses indigestion, and she almost passed out right then and there. Her eyes burning and he nostrils curdling over, Meg gasped and wheezed at the horrific stench and wondered just what could possibly make such a foul odor.

And the answer was sitting on her bed.

"Oh hey, there you are dork."

Meg wasn't sure if it was the gas burning her eyes or the smell frying her brain, but she saw herself sitting on her bed! Well not exactly her; it was the hotter version of herself from when she had that record deal. She was blonde, pretty, and for some reason not wearing pants. Before Meg could question what was going on, Blonde Meg jumped off the bed and ran up to her uglier self, then shoved Meg's face into her asscrack.

"Count some sheep, nerd, you and I have a lot to do today and I need more time to get ready."

info.brief_description: Meg Griffin gets fart tortured by her family and others in Quahog
info.description:
Hey everyone,

This is my first story and it's about Meg...getting fart tortured!

Rules:

Allowed:

Fart/Toilet Torture
Male on Female
2 against one
Fartee Shrink


Not Allowed:
Vore (all types)
Death
Short Chapters (try to make it longer than a paragraph)

Meg can fart too (but make it more of Meg being farted on)
Try not to end the story
Also, please have good grammar when adding chapters.

I don not own anyone from Family Guy and have fun!
